title: Enhance Ability
content:
nhance Ability lets you choose between 6 possible effects, each lasting until Long Rest: Bear's Endurance: Gain Advantage on Constitution Checks, and 7 temporary hit points. Cat's Grace: Gain Advantage on Dexterity Checks, and half damage from falling. Bull's Strength: Gain Advantage on Strength Checks, and double Weight Limit. Eagle's Splendour: Gain Advantage on Charisma Checks. Fox's Cunning: Gain Advantage on Intelligence Checks. Owl's Wisdom: Gain Advantage on Wisdom Checks.
